content.description:
Hic nobis sermonis terminusterminus, -i, m. = finis, -is erat. Nolui enim progrediprogredior, -i = eo, ire longius
ut mihi omnia liberalibera = “free time” servarem dum Aurelius veniret.
content.question: The passage states that the author

choices.label: refused to speak further with Aurelius, worried they might be overheard
thought that they needed to keep working until Aurelius arrives
broke off the conversation to wait for the arrival of Aurelius
had been interrupted by the arrival of Aurelius

content.answer: broke off the conversation to wait for the arrival of Aurelius
